suite.name: AndroidSampleApp

kw.name: Set Up - Suite
kw.doc: This keyword is used to start appium server and open application in Device/Simulator

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server.

test.name: Test Case 01 : Addition of Integer values

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Through SimpleApp Perform
kw.doc: This keyword perfroms Add/Sub/Mul/Div on Device/Simulator and returns the result value displayed

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is enabled.

kw.name: Clear Text
kw.doc: Clears the text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is enabled.

kw.name: Clear Text
kw.doc: Clears the text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is false.

arguments.arg: Error: Operation must be Add or Sub or Mul or Div

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

test.doc: This test case covers adding two interger values using 'Simple app' in real Device/Simulator

suite.doc: This is the mobile automation Test suite file (Base Execution File) for Android Sample App. covers 10 different scenario's of Addition, subtraction, Multiplication and Division. Framework : Robot; Supporting language : Python, Automation tool : Appium. Screenshots : Generated under 'result' folder Log and report : In built robot framework, generated under 'result' folder
